00024 using namespace detail;
00025 
00034 bool getbit(const integer& n, size_t bit) {
00035     n._throw_if_nan();
00036     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00037     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00038         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00039         return ((n._get_digit(index) & mask) != 0);
00040     } else return false;
00041 }
00042 
00050 void setbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00051     n._throw_if_nan();
00052     n._make_unique();
00053     detail::data_t *ndata=n._get_data();
00054 
00055     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00056     if (index >= n._get_length()) ndata->realloc(index+1);
00057 
00058     digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00059     ndata->digits[index] |= mask;
00060     ndata->skipLeadingZeros();
00061 }
00062 
00070 void clearbit(integer& n, size_t bit) {
00071     n._throw_if_nan();
00072     size_t index=bit/bits_per_digit;
00073     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00074         n._make_unique();
00075         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00076         n._get_data()->digits[index] &= ~mask;
00077         n._get_data()->skipLeadingZeros();
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00090 size_t lowestbit(const integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00091     if (n.sign()==0) return valueIfZero;
00092 
00093     const detail::data_t *ndata=n._get_data();
00094     const digit_t *p=ndata->digits, *pe=p+ndata->mLength;
00095     while (p!=pe && *p==0) ++p;
00096 
00097     size_t index=(p - ndata->digits);
00098     size_t r=(bits_per_digit * index);
00099     digit_t digit=*p;
00100 
00101     while ((digit & 0x01)==0) {
00102         digit>>=1;
00103         ++r;
00104     }
00105 
00106     return r;
00107 }
00108 
00118 size_t highestbit(const integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00119     if (n.sign()==0) return valueIfZero;
00120     return static_cast<size_t>(log2(n)-1);
00121 }

00129 integer bitwise_and(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00130     n1._throw_if_nan();
00131     n2._throw_if_nan();
00132 
00133     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00134     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00135 
00136     integer r;
00137     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00138     rdata->alloc(smaller->mLength);
00139 
00140     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength, *s2=larger->digits;
00141     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00142 
00143     while (s1 < s1e) *t++ = *s1++ & *s2++;
00144 
00145     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00146     return r;
00147 }
00148 
00155 integer bitwise_or(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00156     n1._throw_if_nan();
00157     n2._throw_if_nan();
00158 
00159     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00160     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00161 
00162     integer r;
00163     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00164     rdata->alloc(larger->mLength);
00165 
00166     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength;
00167     const digit_t *s2=larger->digits, *s2e=s2+larger->mLength;
00168     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00169 
00170     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ | *s2++;
00171     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00172 
00173     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00174     return r;
00175 }

00184 integer bitwise_xor(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00185     n1._throw_if_nan();
00186     n2._throw_if_nan();
00187 
00188     const detail::data_t *smaller=n1._get_data(), *larger=n2._get_data();
00189     if (smaller->mLength > larger->mLength) std::swap(smaller, larger);
00190 
00191     integer r;
00192     detail::data_t *rdata=r._get_data();
00193     rdata->alloc(larger->mLength);
00194 
00195     const digit_t *s1=smaller->digits, *s1e=s1+smaller->mLength;
00196     const digit_t *s2=larger->digits, *s2e=s2+larger->mLength;
00197     digit_t *t=rdata->digits;
00198 
00199     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ ^ *s2++;
00200     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00201 
00202     rdata->skipLeadingZeros();
00203     return r;
00204 }
00205 
00214 integer shift(const integer& n, int byBits) {
00215     if (byBits > 0) return shift_left(n, byBits);
00216     else return shift_right(n, -byBits);
00217 }
00218 
00226 integer shift_left(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00227     n._throw_if_nan();
00228 
00229     if (byBits==0) return n;
00230 
00231     integer nn(n);
00232     nn._make_unique();
00233     nn._get_data()->shift_left(byBits);
00234     return nn;
00235 }
00236 
00244 integer shift_right(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00245     n._throw_if_nan();
00246 
00247     if (byBits==0) return n;
00248 
00249     integer nn(n);
00250     nn._make_unique();
00251     nn._get_data()->shift_right(byBits);
00252     return nn;
00253 }
